QuestData.Title: Prison of the Forgotten
QuestData.Description:
<As you stare at the object you've found, you sense it may lead you to another part of this wretched tower.
Perhaps Ve'nari may know more of its purpose.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the object back to Ve'nari.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find a Domination Lock within Torghast's antechamber.
QuestData.RewardText: <As you place the key into the device, it shudders for a moment and begins to unlock.>
